settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.text: Easy Meal Preparation & Cleanup: At Table & Twine, we take care of the prep work so you can spend more time enjoying your meal than making it. After placing an order with our convenient online system, sit back while we do the rest. You will still get the satisfaction of providing a delicious meal with much less time and energy. After the game, cleanup will be much quicker thanks to our thoughtfully designed packages.

Impressive Game Day Snacks: Together, we can provide a mouthwatering meal that will be the talk of the party. We’ll take care of the difficult planning, sourcing, and prepping so you can deliver an impressive lineup of snacks for your guests. Just finish off the dishes in the oven or on the stove to create a polished meal.

Unforgettable Flavor: We know that March Madness excitement is fueled by the right food. A Table & Twine meal kit is just what your gathering needs to take it to the next level. Each dish is handcrafted by a professional chef who knows how to excite the taste buds.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: Why Choose a March Madness Meal Kit?
settings.text2: Partner with Table & Twine this March Madness season to make hosting a breeze. By doing so, you will enjoy benefits such as:

settings.title: How much time Is required to prepare the food in my March Madness meal kit?
settings.text: Instead of spending all day in the kitchen, a Table & Twine meal kit ensures that your March Madness treats will be finished in under two hours.

settings.title: How far in advance do I need to order my March Madness meal kit?
settings.text: If you’re interested in partnering with Table & Twine, place an order for your March Madness meal kit order between Tuesday, March 8th and Friday, April 1st. Afterwards, sit back and relax while we take care of the rest.

settings.title: Can I customize my March Madness meal kit?
settings.text: The March Madness meal kit is not customizable. Each package includes a wide variety of delicious treats so you can be sure that there’s something for everyone.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
